title: Kilometrobio
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Macrobiotic, Mediterranean, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Store and cafe offering plenty fresh produce and food. Specialties are couscous, lasagna, moussaka, veggie kebab, chili no carne. Daily specials might include soya with curry, spelt with veg pesto, and cheesecake. Reported all food is vegan (May 2015).
streetAddress: Via Vittorio Emanuele II 46 cortile interno
